DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate LNG-IUD ENG implant user willing use contraception beyond end FDA-approved duration . Implant user also offer participate arm study randomize either keep implant remove replace new implant . Participants follow three year .
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective cohort study evaluate 675 LNG-IUD user 675 ENG implant user within 6 month expiration beyond end FDA-approved duration . Participants contact via telephone either schedule enroll person mail consent form participation EPIC study . After signed consent form obtain , participant also ask complete brief telephone in-person questionnaire sociodemographic , medical reproductive history , sexual contraceptive history , history unintended pregnancy substance abuse . During informed consent process , implant user also offer participate arm study randomize ( consent ) either keep subdermal implant remove replace new subdermal implant . The randomized control trial subset allow u compare effectiveness new implant . It also allow u ass `` contraceptive use '' ( e.g . condom use ) group . Participants also ask interested provide blood sample analysis etonogestrel assay level baseline enrollment annually . If Follow-up phone interview occur every 6 month 36 month beyond expiration method . The investigator attempt validate pregnancy outcomes medical chart review .
DOC.criteria: Women age 1845 Within 6 month expiration beyond end FDAapproved duration use levonorgestrel intrauterine device ( LNGIUD = 5 year ) OR etonogestrelreleasing subdermal implant ( ENG implant = 3 year ) Able consent English Spanish . Have history female sterilization procedure Desire conception next 12 month Not sexually active male partner
